authentication.getauthenticationdescription: When you sign in to the Cloud BI, an authentication token is provided that should be attached in the request header(Authorization) for all subsequent API calls to authenticate the requests.

dashbaordviewsdescription.getdashbaordviewsdescription: To retrieve, add, update, and delete a list of dashboard views in a particular dashboard from the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.

attributesdescription.getattributesdescription: To retrieve, add, update, and delete the attributes, also to customize a particular dashboard for user, group, and site, use the following corresponding endpoints.

groupdescription.getgroupsdescription: Use the corresponding endpoints listed below, to retrieve a list of groups, create, modify, and delete a particular group from the Cloud BI.

userdescription.getusersdescription: To add, retrieve, update, and delete users, a list of groups of the particular user, add CSV users, download CSV templates in the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.

permissiondescription.getpermissiondescription: Use the corresponding endpoints listed below, to retrieve a list of permissions, create, and delete particular permission in the Bold BI Cloud.

categorydescription.getcategorydescription: To create and modify a particular category in the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.

slideshowdescription.getslideshowdescription: To retrieve, create, modify and delete a particular slideshow and retrieve list of slideshows in the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.

scheduledescription.getscheduledescription: To retrieve, create, and modify a particular dashboard schedule, retrieve the list of dashboard schedules, and run the schedules in the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.

settingsdescription.getsettingsdescription: To modify the site settings in the Bold BI Cloud, use the corresponding endpoints below.

pinboarddescription.getpinboarddescription: To retrieve, create, copy, and delete a particular pinboard in the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.

dashboarddescription.getdashboarddescription: To copy, retrieve, and export dashboards in the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.

datasourcedescription.getdatasourcedescription: To retrieve a list of data sources, and copy a particular data source in the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.

draftdashboarddescription.getdraftdashboarddescription: To retrieve a list of draft dashboards, create and modify a particular draft dashboard in the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.

itemdescription.getitemdescription: To retrieve a list of items, retrieve, delete a particular item, and check a particular item name in the Cloud BI, use the corresponding endpoints below.
